statements: SELECT * FROM neural_network_configurations WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, optimizer FROM neural_network_configurations WHERE activation_function = 'relu';
SELECT experiment_id, model_name, layers, activation_function FROM neural_network_configurations ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_configurations WHERE optimizer = 'adam' AND layers LIKE '%conv%';
SELECT experiment_id, COUNT(*) AS num_configs FROM neural_network_configurations GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING num_configs > 1;
SELECT experiment_id, model_name FROM neural_network_configurations ORDER BY experiment_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM neural_network_configurations WHERE optimizer='Adam'
SELECT experiment_id, model_name, layers FROM neural_network_configurations WHERE activation_function='ReLU' ORDER BY experiment_id LIMIT 2
SELECT model_name, activation_function, optimizer FROM neural_network_configurations WHERE layers LIKE '%conv%'
SELECT * FROM neural_network_configurations ORDER BY experiment_id ASC
SELECT * FROM neural_networks;
SELECT id, name, layers FROM neural_networks WHERE activation_function = 'ReLU';
SELECT name, layers, activation_function FROM neural_networks WHERE layers > 3 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT experiment_date, result FROM experiments WHERE result LIKE '%success%' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT neural_networks.name, experiments.experiment_name, experiments.result FROM neural_networks JOIN experiments ON neural_networks.id = experiments.neural_network_id;
SELECT * FROM neural_networks WHERE layers > 3;
SELECT name, activation_function FROM neural_networks WHERE learning_rate < 0.01;
SELECT * FROM neural_networks ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT neural_networks.name, experiments.experiment_name FROM neural_networks JOIN experiments ON neural_networks.id = experiments.neural_network_id;
SELECT AVG(layers) as avg_layers, MAX(learning_rate) as max_learning_rate FROM neural_networks;
SELECT * FROM neural_networks;
SELECT id, name, optimizer FROM neural_networks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT neural_network_id, accuracy, loss FROM experiments WHERE accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters WHERE learning_rate BETWEEN 0.001 AND 0.01;
SELECT experiment_name, batch_size, epochs FROM experiments JOIN hyperparameters ON experiments.id = hyperparameters.experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM neural_networks ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, name, optimizer FROM neural_networks WHERE optimizer = 'Adam' AND layers @> ARRAY['Convolutional', 'Dense'];

SELECT e.experiment_name, n.name, h.learning_rate FROM experiments e JOIN neural_networks n ON e.neural_network_id = n.id JOIN hyperparameters h ON e.id = h.experiment_id WHERE h.learning_rate > 0.001;
SELECT n.name AS network_name, e.accuracy, e.loss FROM experiments e JOIN neural_networks n ON e.neural_network_id = n.id WHERE e.accuracy IS NOT NULL ORDER BY e.loss DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT h.experiment_id, AVG(h.learning_rate) AS avg_learning_rate, MAX(h.batch_size) AS max_batch_size FROM hyperparameters h GROUP BY h.experiment_id HAVING COUNT(h.id) > 2 ORDER BY avg_learning_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM neural_networks;
SELECT name, optimizer FROM neural_networks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT layers, optimizer FROM neural_networks WHERE learning_rate > 0.01;
SELECT name, layers FROM neural_networks ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, start_date, end_date FROM experiments WHERE neural_network_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM neural_networks ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, optimizer FROM neural_networks WHERE learning_rate > 0.001;

SELECT nn.name, d.name AS dataset_name, t.accuracy FROM neural_networks nn JOIN experiments e ON nn.id = e.neural_network_id JOIN datasets d ON e.dataset_id = d.dataset_id JOIN training_logs t ON t.experiment_id = e.experiment_id WHERE t.accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT layers, optimizer FROM neural_networks WHERE name LIKE '%convolutional%';

SELECT e.experiment_id, nn.name, d.name AS dataset_name, t.training_loss, t.validation_loss FROM experiments e JOIN neural_networks nn ON e.neural_network_id = nn.id JOIN datasets d ON e.dataset_id = d.dataset_id JOIN training_logs t ON t.experiment_id = e.experiment_id WHERE t.validation_loss < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM neural_networks ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, layers FROM neural_networks WHERE learning_rate > 0.001;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, config_name FROM configurations WHERE model_type = 'CNN';
SELECT id, value FROM hyperparameters WHERE parameter_name = 'dropout_rate';
SELECT * FROM neural_networks ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, layers FROM neural_networks WHERE learning_rate > 0.001;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT experiment_name, description, start_date FROM experiments WHERE id = 5;
SELECT config_name, model_type, optimizer FROM configurations ORDER BY config_name ASC;
